title: Suella Braverman – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Suella Braverman, the Conservative MP for Fareham, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content: If we are to serve the British people successfully, the Conservative Party needs unity, stability and the skills to fix the challenges we face.
That is why I am proud to support ⁦Rishi Sunak⁩ to be our Leader and Prime Minister.
